#id=1
#text=I was about to ride my bicycle to the park one day when I noticed that the front tire was flat .
#id=2
#text=I realized I would have to repair it .
#id=3
#text=I went into my garage to get some tools .
#id=4
#text=The first thing I did was remove the tire by unscrewing the screws that were holding the wheel in place .
#id=5
#text=Once that was done , I examined the wheel to see what the damage was .
#id=6
#text=It turns out a nail must have punctured the tire .
#id=7
#text=I took some glue and proceeded to glue a tube patch over the tiny hole .
#id=8
#text=I continued to apply pressure to the tube patch .
#id=9
#text=When that was done , I inflated the tire back to fullness .
#text=As I was inflating the tire , I made sure the patch stayed in place .
#text=I then reattached the wheel back on the bicycle and it was good to go .
#text=I happily took my bike out to the park as I had initially wanted to .
